name: Infinity Beatdown (But with Lucius)
description:
THIS ENTRY IS DISQUALIFIED FROM HAROLD JAM 2023 BECAUSE HUMAN IS A DIRTY DIRTY CHEATER. DON'T PLAY IT IF YOU ARE IN A TIME CRUNCH. It is will literally be disqualified before jam ends (there's button for that). It is, however, a totally awesome game.

Join martial scholar Lucius and Chonker the baby chungusaur as they relentlessly pummel and/or occasionally eat their foes. 

Showcases Human Impact Turn System, which mixes the planning and strategy of JRPG turn based combat with the speed and instant gratification of ARPGs. Attack with directional keys, change battlers mid attack, and strike a balance between offense and defense. 

This "new" project was created by pasting all of Human's award winning and totally kick-ass game, Infiinity Beatdown, into a new project, then ham-handedly adding in Lucius. This is totally cheating so Human exercised his discretion and disqualified himself.
